com.madrobot.net

Class CarrierHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.net.CarrierHelper

  • public final class CarrierHelper
extends Object
    Utility to find out the current carrier type used by the device. (i.e) Wifi or 3G

    Note:ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission needs to be set before using this class. It implements a dynamic broadcast listener that receives carrier information as and when it changes.
    Usage:

     android.content.Context context= //current app context
 CarrierHelper carrier=CarrierHelper.getInstance(context);
 CarrierHelper.Carrier current=carrier.getCurrentCarrier();
 if(current!=null){
  //network operations can be performed.
 }

    Author:
    Elton Kent

        Returns:
